name: Smoked Paprika
properties: Adds depth and smoky flavor without adding fat
benefits: Smoked paprika is rich in carotenoids and other antioxidants, providing anti-inflammatory benefits and vitamin A precursors. It adds a distinctive smoky, savory flavor to dishes without adding fat or calories, making it perfect for plant-based cooking. Featured in the cookbook's Cheesy Broccoli Soup for depth of flavor.
amount: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon per recipe, as part of daily herb and spice servings

quotes: 1 teaspoon smoked paprika - Cheesy Broccoli Soup (page 59)
